nodes.text: Rorak was an astronomical object located in the Hutt Space region of the galaxy. It was connected to Ylesia, Nal Hutta and Circumtore, also of Hutt Space, by hyperspace routes. Rorak was located at galactic coordinates S-12.

Rorak was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. The astronomical object originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was a planet known as Rorak 4 and first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
